title: Tomb Raider/Witchblade: Trouble Seekers
description: Lara and Sara are back in a few of their most celebrated crossover events! Trouble Seekers contains their first ever meeting (the Tomb Raider/Witchblade Special) and their second historic teaming in the Witchblade/Tomb Raider Special. You can now relive these classic adventures all over again! Also including the hard-to-find Witchblade/Tomb Raider #1/2 issue, this book features an all-new cover by artist Michael Turner.
author: Michael Layne Turner
